types:type.name: postOrder
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type postOrder = {| customerId: String, cartTotal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, items: Array<{| itemId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "double"} |}> |} {"example": "{\"customerId\":\"abc@whatever.com\",\"cartTotal\":131.67,\"items\":[{\"itemId\":1001,\"quantity\":1,\"price\":75.25},{\"itemId\":1002,\"quantity\":3,\"price\":10.99},{\"itemId\":1003,\"quantity\":3,\"price\":23.45}]}"}
